specialMeetings.calledBy: President or petition of 4 member organizations

agendaDistribution.preparation: Prepared by President, reviewed by Executive Board
agendaDistribution.method: Email to all chapter presidents and delegates
requiredContents: Call to order and opening rituals

minutesDistribution.archivalPosting: Posted to intranet portal within 3 days of approval

meetingProtocols.delegateAllowance: Chapters may send up to 2 delegates; each chapter has 1 vote
meetingProtocols.officerVoting: Officers may vote only to break ties
meetingProtocols.motionRequirements: All motions require second and majority vote unless otherwise specified
meetingProtocols.minutesContent: Attendance, motions, votes, action items, assignments

attendanceRequirements.goodStanding: Chapters must attend 3 of 4 quarterly meetings
attendanceRequirements.excusedAbsences: Must be excused by President in writing
attendanceRequirements.probationRequirement: Chapters on probation must attend 100% of meetings
